titleStmt.title: A letter from Gen. Monck in Scotland, to the Commissioners of Parliament in Ireland, touching his present actings For the Commander in Chief of the forces in Ireland, to be communicated to the rest of the officers of the Army there.
titleStmt.author: Albemarle, George Monck, Duke of, 1608-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Dublin by special Order: and re-printed at London, for Nath. Brook, at the Angel in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
